entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 21.
